name: Elemental Dungeon (Ho88it)
description:
The goal of the game is to defeat all fire and ice spirits in a given room.  You accomplish this by hitting them with projectiles of their opposite element.  Projectiles will only deal damage to/heal enemies if bounced by the player's mirror.  In order to do this, you must use your mirror to bounce fireballs at ice spirits and iceballs at fire spirits.  

Controls:

[A],[S],[D],[F]: Move

 [Left Click]: Change Mirror Shape

[Mouse]: Move Mirror

 [F]: Toggle Fullscreen
